trans-unit.source: Change your password

Warning: There is a possibility that cookies are not enabled in your web browser! If your login disappears on your next click that is the case and you should enable cookies (or accept cookies from this website) immediately!
trans-unit.target: אזהרה: ישנה אפשרות שקוקיז לא מופעלים בדפדפן שלך! אם פרטי הכניסה נעלמים בקליק הבא זאת הסיבה וכדאי שתפעיל את הקוקיז (או תאפשר קבלת קוקיז מאתר זה) מיד!

trans-unit.source: Your password has been saved. You can now login with your new password.
trans-unit.target: סיסמתך נשמרה. אתה יכול כעת להכנס עם הסיסמא החדשה.

trans-unit.source: Change your password
Please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: אנא הכנס את הסיסמא החדשה פעמיים. אורך מינימאלי של סיסמה הוא %s תווים.

trans-unit.source: Error: there is no prefix for the link. Please set one of the following in your typoscript template: plugin.tx_felogin_pi1.feloginBaseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.baseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.absRefPrefix = /
trans-unit.target: שגיאה: אין תחילית עבור הקישור. אנא קבע אחד מהתחיליות הבאות בתבנית ה-typoscript: plugin.tx_felogin_pi1.feloginBaseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.baseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.absRelPrefix = http://yourdomain/

trans-unit.source: The passwords are not equal, please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: הסיסמאות שונות, אנא הכנס את הסיסמא החדשה. אורך מינימאלי של סיסמא הוא %s תווים.

trans-unit.source: The link you clicked is not valid. Please repeat the forgot password procedure.
trans-unit.target: הקישור עליו לחצת אינו תקין. אנא חזור על תהליך הסיסמא שנשכחה.

trans-unit.source: The password length is too short. Please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: הסיסמה קצרה מדי. אנא הכנס את הסיסמאות החדשות פעמיים. אורך מינימאלי של סיסמא הוא %s תווים.

trans-unit.source: Username or email address
Login failure

An error occurred during login. Most likely you didn't enter the username or password correctly. Be certain that you enter them precisely as they are, including upper/lower case. Another possibility is that cookies might be disabled in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: אירעה טעות בכניסה. ככל הנראה לא הכנסת את שם המשתמש או הסיסמא הנכונים. שים לב שהפרטים מוכנסים באופן מדויק, כולל אותיות גדולות/קטנות. אפשרות נוספת היא שהדפדפן שלך לא מפעיל קוקיז.

trans-unit.source:
Your password Hi %s
We couldn't find a username for this email address and so cannot send the password to you. Probably you misspelled the email address (upper/lower case makes a difference) or maybe you even didn't register yet?

Your password Hi %s
Your username is "%s" Your password is "%s"
trans-unit.target:
פרטי התחברות שלום %s
שם משתמש שלך: "%s" סיסמה שלך: "%s"

trans-unit.source: Forgot your password?
Return to login form

Please enter the email address by which you registered your user account. Then press "Send password" and your password will immediately be emailed to you. Make sure to spell your email address correctly.
Your password has now been sent to the email address %s
Please enter your username or email address. Instructions for resetting the password will be immediately emailed to you.
An email has been sent to the address stored in your account and contains a link to reset your password. If you do not receive an email, your account or email address was not found.
Your account or email address does not exist.

Your new password Dear %s,
This email was sent in response to your request to reset your password. Please click on the link below. %s
For security reasons, this link is only active until %s. If you do not visit the link before then, you will need to repeat the password reset steps.
You have logged out.
You just logged out from your user session on this website. You can login again or as another user by the form below.
trans-unit.target: המשתמש יצא מזמן מאתר זה. אתה יכול להכנס שוב או כמשתמש אחר באמצעות הטופס שלהלן.

trans-unit.source: Current status
This is your current status
Login successful
You are now logged in as '###USER###'
User login
Enter your username and password here in order to log in on the website
trans-unit.target: הכנס שם משתמש וסיסמא כאן כדי להכנס לאתר

trans-unit.source: Login
Logout
Enter new password
Repeat new password
Url "%s" for redirect was not accepted!
trans-unit.note: This label is deprecated (not used anymore) since TYPO3v9

trans-unit.source: Password
Stay logged in
Reset Password
Send password
Username
Url "%s" contained an XSS attack and was cleaned!
trans-unit.note: This label is deprecated (not used anymore) since TYPO3v8

trans-unit.source: Your email
